element.name: IsPointInRect
element.short: Returns true when the point AP is inside a rectangle or on its borders.
element.descr: The rectangle can be specified as a TRect structure or by its top/left and bottom/right corner points (TPoint).

element.name: IsRectInRect
element.short: Returns true when a rectangle is contained within another rectangle
element.descr: Note: The rectangle is still considered to be contained within the outer rectangle even when their corners collide.

element.name: CopyPoints
element.short: Copies the points from a TPoint array to the result array

element.name: DotProduct
element.short: Calculates the dot product of the two 2D vectors A and B
element.descr: The dot product of two vectors A and B is calculated as Result := A.X * B.X + A.Y * B.Y

element.name: DoublePoint
element.short: Creates a TDoublePoint record from two floating point values AX and AY, or from a TPoint having integer coordinates

element.name: DoubleRect
element.short: Creates a TDoubleRect data structure from four floating point values

element.name: ExpandRect
element.short: Expands the given rectangle by the X and Y values of the specified point

element.name: IsPointOnLine
element.short: Returns true when the point AP is on the line between the points A1 and A2

element.name: IsPointInPolygon
element.short: Returns true when the point AP is inside or on the border of the polygon define by the points in the array APolygon

element.name: IsLineIntersectsLine
element.short: Returns true when the line defined by the points AA and AB intersects the line given by the points AC and AD

element.name: IsPolygonIntersectsPolygon
element.short: Returns true when the two polygons given by the point arrays AP1 and AP2, respectively, intersect

element.name: LineIntersectsRect
element.short: Returns true when the line given by the points AA and AB intersects the given rectangle ARect

element.name: MakeSquare
element.short: Creates a square rectangle from the input rectangle ARect
element.descr: The length of the longer side is shortened to become equal to the shorter side.

element.name: MaxPoint
element.short: Creates a TPoint from the maximum x and y coordinates of two other points, A and B

element.name: NormalizeRect
element.short: Ensures that the corner coordinates of the given rectangle are in the correct order

ul.li: for integer coordinates: Left <= Right and Top <= Bottom
for floating point coordinates:a.X <= b.X and a.Y <= b.Y

element.name: PointDist
element.short: Returns a parameter characterizing the distance between the points A and B

descr.p: The "distance" is calculated as the square of the sum of the coordinate differences:
The standard Euclidian distance would be obtained by calculating the square root of the result.

element.name: PointDistX
element.short: Returns the difference of the X coordinates of the two points A and B

element.name: PointDistY
element.short: Returns the difference of the Y coordinates of the two points A and B

element.name: PointLineDist
element.short: Returns a parameter for the distance between point P and the line given by the points A and B
element.descr: Note that this parameter corresponds to the squared Euclidian distance.
